title: Hard-Boiled Eggs
description: Learn how to make perfect hard-boiled eggs every time!
instructions: Place the eggs in a single layer in a large saucepan.
Add enough cold water to cover the eggs by about 1 inch.
Place the saucepan on the stove over high heat and bring the water to a boil.
Once the water is boiling, cover the saucepan with a lid and remove it from the heat.
Let the eggs sit in the hot water for 9-12 minutes, depending on how well-cooked you like your eggs.
Drain the hot water and immediately transfer the eggs to a bowl of ice water to cool and stop the cooking process.
Once the eggs have cooled, peel and enjoy!
